A Federal department or agency may give a
			 preference in the award of a contract for the procurement of goods or services
			 in a fiscal year to any potential contractor that has not engaged in
			 outsourcing during the fiscal year preceding the fiscal year in which the
			 contract is awarded.

text.#text:
In any solicitation for offers for a contract issued by a
			 Federal department or agency in a fiscal year, the department or agency shall
			 request each offeror for the contract to provide information regarding whether
			 the offeror engaged in outsourcing during the fiscal year preceding the fiscal
			 year in which the contract is to be awarded.
